languages.text: "Замысел? Я всего лишь верный слуга своего господина. Покуда я нахожу для него новые способы проливать кровь и ломать черепа, господин Винтерскейл доволен. А значит доволен и я". {n}Губы архмилитанта рассекает хищный оскал.{/n}

"Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Замысел? Я всего лишь верный слуга своего господина. Покуда я нахожу для него новые способы проливать кровь и ломать черепа, господин Винтерскейл доволен. А значит доволен и я". {n}Губы архмилитанта рассекает хищный оскал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Plan? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips split into a predatory grin.{/n}

"Plan? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips split into a predatory grin.{/n}

"Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Tramar, yo? No soy más que el leal siervo de mi señor. Mientras siga ideando para él nuevas formas de derramar sangre y partir cráneos, milord Winterscale se da por satisfecho. Lo que significa que yo también». {n}Los labios del Archimilitante se curvan en una sonrisa salvaje.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Yo, un plan? No soy más que el leal siervo de mi señor. Mientras siga ideando para él nuevas formas de derramar sangre y partir cráneos, milord Winterscale se da por satisfecho. Lo que significa que yo también». {n}Los labios del archimilitante se curvan en una sonrisa maliciosa.{/n}

languages.text: “算盘？我只是主人的忠实仆人。我要做的，就是不断想出新的方法，让猎物流血，劈开他们的脑袋，满足温特斯凯尔大人的需求。当然，我也可以从中得到满足。”{n}首席战士咧开嘴巴，露出凶狠的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “计划？我只是主人的忠实仆人。我要做的，就是不断想出新的方法，让猎物流血，劈开他们的脑袋，满足温特斯凯尔大人的需求。当然，我也可以从中得到满足。”{n}首席战士咧开嘴巴，露出掠夺性的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: « Ce que je manigance ? Je ne suis qu'un fidèle serviteur de mon maître. Tant que je continue à lui trouver de nouvelles manières de verser le sang et de briser des crânes, mon seigneur est satisfait... et moi aussi. » {n}Le visage de l'archimilitant se fend d'un sourire sauvage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je manigance ? Je ne suis qu'un fidèle serviteur de mon maître. Tant que je continue à lui trouver de nouvelles manières de verser le sang et de briser des crânes, mon seigneur est satisfait... et moi aussi. » {n}Le visage de l'archimilitant se fend d'un sourire prédateur.{/n}

languages.text: 「企んでる？俺は主の忠実な下僕にすぎない。主のために血を流し、頭蓋骨を割る新しい方法を考案し続ける限り、主、ウィンタースケールは満足する。つまり、俺も同じだ」{n} アーク・ミリタントの唇が凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「企んでる？俺は主の忠実な下僕にすぎない。主のために血を流し、頭蓋骨を割る新しい方法を考案し続ける限り、主、ウィンタースケールは満足する。つまり、俺も同じだ」{n} アーク・ミリタントの唇が凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: "Im Schilde führen? Ich bin lediglich ein treuer Diener meines Herren. So lange ich mir neue Wege einfallen lassen, für ihn Blut zu vergießen und Schädel zu spalten, ist mein Lord Winterzunder zufrieden. Und damit auch ich." {n}Die Lippen des Erzmilitants teilen sich zu einem animalischen Grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Plan? Ich bin lediglich ein treuer Diener meines Herren. So lange ich mir neue Wege einfallen lassen, für ihn Blut zu vergießen und Schädel zu spalten, ist mein Lord Winterzunder zufrieden. Und damit auch ich." {n}Die Lippen des Erzmilitanten teilen sich zu einem räuberischen Grinsen.{/n}

languages.text: "Entrika mı? Ben yalnızca lordumun sadık bir hizmetkârıyım. Onun için yeni kan dökme ve kafa kırma yöntemleri bulduğum sürece lordum Winterscale'i memnun ederim. Bu, beni de memnun eder." {n}Başmilitan'ın dudakları, vahşi bir sırıtışla aralanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Plotting? I am merely a loyal servant of my lord. As long as I keep devising new ways to spill blood and crack skulls for him, my lord Winterscale is satisfied. And that means, so am I." {n}The Arch-Militant's lips part in a feral grin.{/n}
